parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadvertent Unlatching of Passenger Seat Belt
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended release of the passenger seat belt can lead to serious injury or even death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The passenger seat belt comes undone on its own
making a faint clicking sound
followed by the latch withdrawing slowly. The belt buckle may feel securely latched
but still comes undone while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt lock system can cause the shoulder belt to not restrain properly, leading to serious injury or even death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seat belt lock system fails to restrain properly
causing the shoulder belt to not function as intended.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Difficulty Releasing Seat Belt from Anchor
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inability to release the seat belt from the anchor can cause delays in exiting the vehicle, potentially leading to injuries or fatalities in emergency situations.
symptoms: The seat belt occasionally fails to release from the anchor when unbuckling.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Poor Design of Horn Button and Seat Belt Buckle
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The non-standard location of the horn button and the design of the seat belt buckle can cause distractions while driving and make it difficult to use the seat belt, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The horn button is difficult to locate while driving
and the seat belt buckle can jam when adjusting
making it hard to use the seat belt.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The absence of a DOT stamp on a tire can make it difficult to determine the tire's age and potentially compromise its safety and performance.
symptoms: Missing or unclear DOT stamp on the tire
uncertainty about the tire's age and manufacturing date.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Tire Failure due to Road Hazard Conditions
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire failure due to road hazards can lead to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Tire blowout
loss of air pressure
bubbles forming on the sidewall of the tire
tire damage caused by road debris.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Tire sidewall defects can lead to tire failure, loss of control, and accidents, potentially causing serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Bubbles or bulges on the inner or outer sidewall of the tire
tire failure
loss of air pressure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature failure of the rear brake pad can cause reduced braking performance, leading to increased stopping distances, and potentially causing accidents or collisions.
symptoms: Squealing or grinding noise when applying the brakes
uneven brake wear
vibrations when braking
reduced braking performance
increased stopping distances.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Malfunction of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, or collisions.
symptoms: ABS light on the dashboard
brakes lock up
vehicle slides or skids when braking
reduced braking performance
increased stopping distances.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of a bolt inside the transmission can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to sudden loss of gear shifting, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly stops changing gears
the transmission fails to engage
the vehicle is unable to move
the transmission makes unusual noises or vibrations.
